name: Badminton
description: I enjoy playing badminton with friends and family. It is a great way to stay active and have fun.

name: Reading
description: I am an avid reader and enjoy reading a variety of genres. It is a great way to learn new things and escape into different worlds.

name: Hiking
description: I love hiking and exploring the great outdoors. It is a great way to stay active and enjoy nature.

name: Photography
description: I enjoy photography and capturing moments in time. It is a creative outlet for me and a way to express myself.

name: Traveling
description: I love traveling and exploring new places. It is a great way to learn about different cultures and meet new people.
